column4: yarg this is frustrating.   Is there some way to trick the upgrade-manager into telling me about a release?

did you run that in alt-f2?
It returns immediately but doesn't appear to do anything
do it in a terminal but replace gksudo with sudo
It hangs, presumably, again, because of the firewall
does it find 8.10 through reg methods?
hpw much data you got on this machine?
switching between lts and normal has no effect
My dissertation and all my code :)
i think you may have to and copy /home for configs, then fresh install

seems like the upgarde from alternate iso file is working.
